original_text: Then a little horn grew out of one of these large horns. It grew to become very big. Its power reached towards the south, towards the east and towards the Beautiful Land.
korean_text: 그 중 한 뿔에서 또 작은 뿔 하나가 나서 남쪽과 동쪽과 또 영화로운 땅을 향하여 심히 커지더니

sentences.original_text: Then a little horn grew out of one of these large horns
sentences.korean_translation: 그후 작은 뿔 하나가 이 큰 뿔들 중 하나에서 나왔습니다

sentences.original_text: It grew to become very big
Its power reached towards the south
Its power reached towards the east
Its power reached towards the Beautiful Land
